text: @SpeakerPelosi Hey Nance...remember that time earlier this year when you encouraged people to go to Chinatown for some sort of street festival? And remember that time you ripped up @POTUS ‘s SOTU address where he mentioned fighting the coronavirus? Yeah, I didn’t think so.
